event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair procedure to replace the appropriate part(s), the identity of which can be determined using 'fmadm faulty'.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: A problem was detected in the interconnect between a memory buffer and its memory controller.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item: There is no more information available at this time.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: If memory has been deconfigured, system performance may be impacted.
event_registry_properties.name: response
event_registry_properties.item: The system crashed to prevent data corruption. Memory in the affected partition may have been deconfigured. (Consult system-specific documentation to find out how to determine if memory has been deconfigured.)
event_registry_properties.name: title
